mapper.select:
select * from pi_children_base_info i
i.child_account_address like concat('%', #{info.childAccountAddress}, '%')
and i.child_current_address like concat('%', #{info.childCurrentAddress}, '%')
and i.child_name like concat('%', #{info.childName}, '%')
and i.child_id_no like concat('%', #{info.childIdNo}, '%')
and i.child_tel_no like concat('%', #{info.childTelNo}, '%')
and i.child_nationality like concat('%', #{info.childNationality}, '%')
and i.child_male like concat('%', #{info.childMale}, '%')
and i.child_health_status like concat('%', #{info.childHealthStatus}, '%')
and i.child_escalation_type like concat('%', #{info.childEscalationType}, '%')
and i.child_disability_type like concat('%', #{info.childDisabilityType}, '%')
and i.child_violation_guardian like concat('%', #{info.childViolationGuardian}, '%')
and i.status = #{info.status}
order by i.create_time desc
select * from pi_children_base_info i where i.child_id=#{childId}

update.if: update pi_children_base_info set status='2',update_time=current_timestamp,updator=#{userId} where creator = #{userId} and status='1'

mapper.select:
select p.child_account_province ,p.child_account_city ,p.child_account_county ,p.child_account_town ,p.child_account_address,p.caseCount,s1.stayCount,s2.dilemmaCount,s3.dibaoCount,s4.disableCount,s5.unsupportedCount,s6.orphanCount from (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,count(0) as caseCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area}
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address) as p left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as stayCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='留守'
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s1 on p.child_account_province=s1.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s1.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s1.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s1.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s1.child_account_address left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as dilemmaCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='困境'
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s2 on p.child_account_province=s2.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s2.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s2.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s2.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s2.child_account_address left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as dibaoCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='困境' and i.child_poverty_alleviation_implementation ='最低生活保障'
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s3 on p.child_account_province=s3.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s3.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s3.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s3.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s3.child_account_address left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as disableCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='困境' and i.child_poverty_alleviation_implementation in ('困难残疾人生活补贴','重度残疾人生活补贴')
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s4 on p.child_account_province=s4.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s4.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s4.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s4.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s4.child_account_address left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as unsupportedCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='困境' and i.child_poverty_alleviation_implementation in ('事实无人抚养津贴')
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s5 on p.child_account_province=s5.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s5.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s5.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s5.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s5.child_account_address left join (select i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type,count(0) as orphanCount from pi_children_base_info i where i.area =#{area} and i.child_escalation_type ='困境' and i.child_poverty_alleviation_implementation in ('孤儿津贴')
and i.child_account_province like concat('%',#{childAccountProvince},'%')
and i.child_account_city like concat('%',#{childAccountCity},'%')
and i.child_account_county like concat('%',#{childAccountCounty},'%')
and i.child_account_town like concat('%',#{childAccountTown},'%')
and i.child_account_address like concat('%',#{childAccountAddress},'%')
group by i.child_account_province ,i.child_account_city ,i.child_account_county ,i.child_account_town ,i.child_account_address,i.child_escalation_type) as s6 on p.child_account_province=s6.child_account_province and p.child_account_city=s6.child_account_city and p.child_account_county=s6.child_account_county and p.child_account_town=s6.child_account_town and p.child_account_address=s6.child_account_address
